scripts.say: Is anyone else getting nauseous from being inside this place...?
Mm, considering how erratically the gravity is shifting around, this would be difficult for a normal person to tolerate, let alone one of us with our rigging.
There are some mass-produced Siren stragglers just ahead of us. Letâ€™s use them to calibrate our shots and to get as familiar with fighting under these conditions as possible.
